PROJECTS

2024
Tower Quest - Resource stockpiling game

JAVA, GRADLE, JAVAFX · Time Management First big project as part of SENG201. We worked in pairs to develop a game from requirements analysis through design stages to implementation and testing.

2024
Microcontroller Game

C PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE · Micro-Controller: ATMEL MEGA32U2 This project involved designing a game in teams of two, where two microcontrollers had to interact. Important aspects here were timing and keeping track of states to enable seamless communication between the devices.

2024

EVENTBRIDGE, LAMBDA, S3, SQS, TERRAFORM, GRAPHQL · Teamwork, Scrumban, Technical Communication and CI/CD As a team of two I developed a pipeline, capturing Usage-Metrics in form of clicks in the front end application, using event driven architecture and AWS products.
